price: I Lut mu jedini povjerova! A Ibrahim reče: “Ja se selim onamo kuda mi je Gospodar moj naredio, jer je On, uistinu, silan i mudar.”
arabic: ۞ فَـَٔامَنَ لَهُۥ لُوطٞۘ وَقَالَ إِنِّي مُهَاجِرٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faāmana lahu lūṭun waqāla innī muhājirun ilā rabbī innahu huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
